metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that youths in Mufulira District are protesting against the Governmentâ€™s alleged award of the Black Mountain dump site to Jubilee Metals Limited, a South African Company, at their expense;
(b) if so, whether indeed the Black Mountain has been awarded to Jubilee Metals Limited;

(d) how the award of the Black Mountain to Jubilee Metals Limited is going to benefit the residents in the District.
(a) what measures the Government is taking to increase the production of solar power; and
(b) which districts are earmarked for the establishment of solar plants.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a Level I hospital in Chembe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to recruit additional agriculture extension officers in Chasefu District; and

(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Chaatila Adopt Report of the Planning and Budgeting Committee: That this House do adopt the Report of the Planning and Budgeting Committee on the Annual Borrowing Plan for the 2024 Financial Year, for the Third Session of the Thirteenth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on Wednesday, 25th October, 2023.
